channel.title: Some simple help
channel.description:
Ok well for a while now i havent been able to connect to any server's , unless it is hamachi.. I am currently running a server off No-Ip . I have tried everything to connect to a server through silab's but no luck - infact NO client allows me to connect.
I have deleted the forwarded port's , i have shut off No-Ip , i have used several Clients and dont tell me the server's offline i have tried every server including 24/7's , even servers that Rune_Locus say are online , even servers that arent on server status..Im extremely pissed of because i have tried everything..
PLEASE GIVE ME A SOLUTION !!![br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 24, 2008, 01:08:10 am[/size][hr]AWW COME ON PLEASE GIVE ME A LITTLE HELP !![br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 24, 2008, 02:30:45 am[/size][hr]PLEASE GIVE ME SOLUTION

item.title: Some simple help

item.description:
@X_SilabScape_X wrote:

Ok well for a while now i havent been able to connect to any server’s , unless it is hamachi…
I am currently running a server off No-Ip . I have tried everything to connect to a server through silab’s but no luck - infact NO client allows me to connect.
